sentence.Network_en: A powerful earthquake struck the Italian island of Sicily early this morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 今日凌晨意大利西西里岛发生强地震。

sentence.Network_en: He also claimed the Kingdom of Naples and Sicily.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还声明拥有那不勒斯和西西里王国.

sentence.Network_en: Twenty minutes later he was on an Italian freighter slated for Sicily.
sentence.Network_cn: 二十分钟之后,他登上了一艘开往西西里的意大利货轮.
